welcome_message_body: "Welcome to North Miami Beach, where the sun always shines and the ocean beckons. Explore our charming city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and endless activities. Enjoy your stay and soak up all the beauty this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport is a small but well-equipped facility, serving both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Perry Airport offers exclusive services and amenities for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fort Lauderdale Executive Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Southwest, JetBlue, and Norwegian.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United, Delta, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American, Spirit, and Allegiant.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as JetBlue, Southwest, and Silver Airways.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and houses the check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights, providing exclusive amenities and services for its passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
